title: Tsutomu Sekido
text:
was a Japanese <a href="Alpine%20skiing">alpine</a>, <a href="Cross-country%20skiing%20%28sport%29">cross-country</a>, and <a href="Nordic%20combined">Nordic combined</a> skier who competed in the <a href="1936%20Winter%20Olympics">1936 Winter Olympics</a>.
In 1936 he participated in the <a href="Alpine%20skiing%20at%20the%201936%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20combined">alpine skiing combined event</a>. He finished 46th in the downhill race, in the slalom he was not allowed to start in the second run. At the same Olympics he finished 55th in the <a href="Cross-country%20skiing%20at%20the%201936%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%2018%20km">18 km cross-country competition</a>. As a member of the Japanese team he finished twelfth in the first ever held <a href="Cross-country%20skiing%20at%20the%201936%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%204%20%C3%97%2010%20km%20relay">cross-country relay contest</a>. In the <a href="Nordic%20combined%20at%20the%201936%20Winter%20Olympics">Nordic combined event</a> he finished 35th.
